00310 inline Pixel Shape::barycenter () const
00311 {
00312     Pixel barycenter(0,0);
00313     
00314     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < pixels_.size(); ++i )
00315     {
00316         barycenter.first    += pixels_.at(i).first;
00317         barycenter.second   += pixels_.at(i).second;
00318     }
00319     barycenter.first    = barycenter.first  / size_;
00320     barycenter.second   = barycenter.second / size_;
00321     
00322     return barycenter;
00323 };

00325 
00326 inline Shape Shape::operator+ (const Shape& shape) const
00327 {
00328     Shape temp;
00329     
00330     // Copy the pixels of this shape
00331     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i )
00332         temp.addPixel( (*this)(i) );
00333     
00334     // Copy the pixels of the second shape
00335     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < shape.size(); ++i )
00336         temp.addPixel( shape(i) );
00337     
00338     return temp;
00339 };
00340 
00341 
00342 inline bool Shape::operator< (const Shape& shape)
00343 {
00344     bool shapeAbove = (this->bottomPixel().first < shape.topPixel().first) and (this->topPixel().first < shape.topPixel().first);
00345     
00346     if ( shapeAbove )
00347         return true;
00348     else
00349     {
00350         bool shapeBelow = (this->bottomPixel().first > shape.bottomPixel().first) and (this->topPixel().first > shape.bottomPixel().first);
00351         
00352         if ( shapeBelow )
00353             return false;
00354         else
00355         {
00356             // Shapes in the same line
00357             bool shapeOnTheLeft     = (this->leftPixel().second < shape.leftPixel().second) and (this->rightPixel().second <= shape.leftPixel().second);
00358             bool shapeOnTheRight    = (this->leftPixel().second >= shape.rightPixel().second) and (this->rightPixel().second > shape.rightPixel().second);
00359             
00360             if ( shapeOnTheLeft )
00361                 return true;
00362             else
00363             {
00364                 if ( shapeOnTheRight )
00365                     return false;
00366                 else
00367                     return true;
00368             }
00369         }
00370     }
00371 };
